website_summaries.verdict: A solid all-around 18-inch subwoofer that delivers consistent low-end dynamics.
pros: Balanced frequency distribution keeps the low-end sound from getting too muddied
Simple speaker design keeps distortion down, regardless of the sound input
cons: Rubber cone is prone to ripping and warping if left in the heat for too long

customer_reviews.title: Sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Just finished building my enclosure with the help from Mark from Car Audio Fabrications I sent him the specs for the subs and the information for my Expedition then he sent me the blueprints and it’s a perfect fit still breaking them in and I am pleased with my purchase thank you Skar PS everyone I showed the subs to couldn’t believe how big they were for only being 8”
customer_reviews.author: Fsun

customer_reviews.title: Skar audio zvx 18s minnnnttt👌
customer_reviews.text: Just as I was looking for. I've owned sundown, America bass, many other big name subs... these are right up there with them. For the price you absolutely cannot beat them. Almost as big a sundown zv4 18. If your debating on these. Go ahead get em.
customer_reviews.author: tim

customer_reviews.title: Yea shes nasty
customer_reviews.text: She's a nasty bitch. Definitely worth the $300 to slap people in the face as you pass by.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Kaba

customer_reviews.title: tuned to 36Hz and it sounds amazing. Skar audio fan for life
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical at first of going to an 8" subwoofer as I am used to having 2 12's. However I have to say this thing is a beast!!! I built a custom ported enclosure, tuned to 36Hz and it sounds amazing. Skar audio fan for life !!!
customer_reviews.author: Mark A. Bishop

customer_reviews.title: Best deep,hard hitting
customer_reviews.text: A++++,This just maybe the best 8" sub I have ever heard.I have been in the audio field around 30 years. I have seen them come and go 'I think this one will be around for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: PBear0169

customer_reviews.title: Big bang for your $
customer_reviews.text: Big bang for your buck. I run this sub on a Skar 2800 watt amp with 3 600 watt batteries and my main battery. With proper tuning this sub sounds amazing. Can flex your doors and well definitely tear your car apart. So far I lost my dome light, 2 door handle covers and all the screws for my rear door panel.
customer_reviews.author: cameron

customer_reviews.title: Awful fart noise
customer_reviews.text: I built a sealed box to spec (.65), gave the woofer the recomended 900 rms matching the ohms, awful sound quality and the woofer gets hot fast. Im thinking i definitly got a bad sub. This set up does not move air, and has no sound quality. I am talking about the skar 8" 900w rms 4ohm,
customer_reviews.author: Rocco

customer_reviews.title: You betcha by golly you'll be wowed
customer_reviews.text: These things are real beasts, when I give people a demo they can't believe that they are 8s. I have two paired with a skar 1500. These will sound the way they are supposed to in a PORTED enclosure not sealed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and then some.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to replace the 2 12in kicker comp R set I had in my trunk and put it in a custom box... didn’t really know what to expect at first but this one 8” subwoofer kicks the every living crap out of those kicker subs. They make them seem almost pathetic. This subwoofer has tight, hard hitting bass, takes care of the lows and mids extremely well. If you’re thinking about buying it stop thinking! This is the subwoofer you want if you’re looking to save space and looking for a HUGE quality improvement. I’m blown away!
customer_reviews.author: Chase Vines

customer_reviews.title: Well built
customer_reviews.text: Money well spent the best speaker on the market for the price well-built the bass hit hard .
customer_reviews.author: kevin wilson

customer_reviews.title: Big magnet if you trying to install in a factory subwoofer box you need to make modifications
customer_reviews.text: I installed this in my Lincoln navigator with some custom modifications done to it big sound from a stock look love it and all have is one of this 8in subwoofer.
customer_reviews.author: Hcer8043

customer_reviews.title: This sub hits!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have this sub running on a small 1200 watt Fosgate amp and it gets low! Definitely a good buy. I plan on getting another one in the near future. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: M&M

customer_reviews.title: Bangs harder than most people can!!!
customer_reviews.text: Can I say this is the best have it in 2014 Dodge Ram just installed with skar 1500.1amp 1ohm zvx12 with the skars new armored 12 inch box you can feel the power in the air also ran with jl 4gauge wire kit the hole set up is strong highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Brandon k.

customer_reviews.title: BANGING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Theyre monsters!!!! I got 2 of them in a box that i built and they beat-up the block.. Like knocking pictures off the wall. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua g.

customer_reviews.title: 10” 300 watts rms to 8” 900 watts rms
customer_reviews.text: Had a 10” 300 watts rms and I got the skar audio 8” 900 watts rms it just didn’t sound as good :(
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: great sub for the price
customer_reviews.text: So I bought the ZVX 18inch D2. the sub was delivered super fast!! sounds good, cant wait for it to be broken in, bet it gets deeper, and louder. I am running it with another 18" in a huge ported box. after displacements its around 15cubic ft! Powered by my soundqubed 4500.1D both subs are D2's so am running amp at 1/2 an ohm. seems to be good quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: Kurtis Franz

customer_reviews.title: Well built and sounds perfect
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a beefy sub and very well built and the sounds is perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ronn

customer_reviews.title: They are amazing
customer_reviews.text: I have run Skar in my truck since my first truck best speakers for the money I just put 4 of the zvx v2 8” subs in my ram 1500 under back seal in a sealed box will dround out 2 18” sundowns running only a 2400 hiphonics amp to it. Love these great price too Skar memeber for life
customer_reviews.author: Frank 🤔

customer_reviews.title: These things are awesome they have not broken in all the way yet ...
customer_reviews.text: These things are awesome they have not broken in all the way yet they are still getting louder everyday would definitely recommend going to buy another one
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bell

customer_reviews.title: Wicked bass!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Sooooooooo listen to me when I tell I was rocking 2 Rockford fosgate t1 12’s which cost more per sub, and when I switch them out for these mon(stars) lol man the bass shakes the whole car in my 2013 Ford Fusion!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Akeemm O'Neal

customer_reviews.title: Hard hitter
customer_reviews.text: Very well built, massive sub for a 8”, and didn’t disappoint when it came to sound quality or depth in bass.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny Miho

customer_reviews.title: 147db
customer_reviews.text: I have a pair in a ported box hooked up to a 5000w amp. Been installed for a few months now and still slamming, driving around they never got hot definitely worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Justin r smart

customer_reviews.title: Big boom for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: These subs beat. They are very underrated for power handling I run my 2 12s at 3000 watts a piece.
customer_reviews.author: Robert watkins

customer_reviews.title: very surprised
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This 8inch sub is unbelievably powerful for its size. I have 4 matched with a rp-4500 and they hit so hard it’s not even funny.
customer_reviews.author: KING MELO

customer_reviews.title: Super loud!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best and loudest subwoofer I have ever owned, at around 120 db peak sound it is more than enough bass!
customer_reviews.author: artemis shoemaker

customer_reviews.title: Zvx
customer_reviews.text: Speaker well exceeds my expectations and they're not even being pushed to their full potential
customer_reviews.author: Roosevelt Overton

customer_reviews.title: Sound different
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed have 2 8" 1 sound realy good the other one sound like hitting something plastic
customer_reviews.author: Christian Rivera

customer_reviews.title: It's bigger than you think
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker I always have been and will be a Skar audio fan
customer_reviews.author: Jamaale Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great sub but I ordered the wrong independence that was ...
customer_reviews.text: Great sub but I ordered the wrong independence that was my fault. I'm hopeing I can send this sub back and get the dual 2 ohm sub because I got a amp from these guys as well and with a dual 1 ohm sub it would be worthless and under powerd so I don't know what to do hopeing they make it right .
customer_reviews.author: Goodfella

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This 8" monster is amazing. Definitely build a tuned box to spec, will sound crappy without
customer_reviews.author: daniel stockdale

customer_reviews.title: Little hammers!
customer_reviews.text: These aren't for the kid who wants some slap, these are little hammers, get a box spec'd-cough eBay cough- and run some serious wattage to these and you'll hit some clean low notes. These are competition quality. Running one from a dd 1400 and def getting another
customer_reviews.author: Jon A

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: I used this with the scar audio rp1500.1d amp and it works extremely well after break in period hits extremely hard. I bought the dual 1ohm and am running 8awg speaker wire with 1/0 power wires and a 200 amp alternator and this thing still pulls my battery down below 12volts at half gain. The subwoofer weighs 53 lbs and needs a big box because it mounts about 9 inches deep and front of box needs to be 1" mdf for the weight and 3 cubic feet for the sub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, amazing bass, bottoms out sometime but I also play it with to much power to it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREATTTT
customer_reviews.text: I love this sub. Hits hard for a small piece of product. Needs a better box and a better matching brand amp. Other than that, thumbs up.
customer_reviews.author: ceessar_

customer_reviews.title: Rubber surround breaks is pieces....
customer_reviews.text: Bass is good....but poor quality rubber surround...if only there was a recone kit....
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo Vidales

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Haven't put in a box yet. I can say when I hooked it up on my kicker zx1500 the excursion was pretty nice. I cannot wait till I build my box. Thinking about getting one more.
customer_reviews.author: untameable61

product_meta.title: Skar Audio ZVX-18v2 D2 18" 3200 Watt Max Power Dual 2 Ohm SPL Car Subwoofer
product_meta.description: Style:18" - Dual 2 OhmThe Skar Audio ZVX-18v2 D2 subwoofer is unrivaled in performance and reliability, and features a max power rating of 3,200 watts. This 18-inch driver was engineered to withstand brutality and perform efficiently at the highest levels of output power, making it an extremely reliable and powerful subwoofer. This subwoofer utilizes a 3-inch high temperature voice coil and a massive triple slug magnet, which combined with its high roll foam surround and competition grade paper cone allow it to perform with sheer excellence. Dual 2 Ohm voice coil configuration. Peak Power: 3,200 Watts, RMS Power: 1,600 Watts, Spl: 88.6 dB. Fs: 26.8 Hz, Xmax: 29 mm, Qts: 0.53, Bl: 20.6 n/a, Frequency Response: 20-400 Hz.
feature_bullets: Peak Power: 3,200 Watts | RMS Power: 1,600 Watts
Massive Triple Stack Magnet & High Temperature 3" 8-layer Copper Voice Coil
Competition Grade Paper Cone and High Roll Foam Surround
Advanced Air Flow Cooling Design | Fs: 26.8 Hz, Xmax: 29mm

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars107 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
